divs: Sighting DetailsBoth myself and another person saw the bright white sphere hovering above area of fireworks. It hung in one place for 30 secs and then moved across sky away from that place at a speed a little faster than a satellite moves. Then it moved bavk toward original area momentsrily and back and forth like this 4 or 5 times before shooting off skyward and away. It was a little brighter than a background star above it but larger in diameter. My initial momentary thought was that it was asatellite but then it maneuvered and I knew it wasn't. We both were watching the object and in awe. Needless to say, the fireworks themselves held iftle fascination after that.
Summary: White globe-like object hovered over fireworks.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Algonac
There were no other sightings in Algonac on or around July 4th 2009
